body_html:
Have I written custom code: N/A
OS Platform and Distribution: UBUNTU 16.04LTS
TensorFlow installed from: https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux#InstallingVirtualenv
CUDA/cuDNN version : N/A
GPU model and memory: N/A
Exact command to reproduce:
1.https://codelabs.developers.google.com/codelabs/tensorflow-for-poets/#3
( generated the new pb file from the above site)=>retranined.pb obtained
2. wanted to convert .tlite format.I have followed the below link:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/README.md
Step 2. Model format conversion
Graph freezing can be done using the command below (and modifying the arguments appropriately)

bazel build tensorflow/python/tools:freeze_graph

bazel-bin/tensorflow/python/tools/freeze_graph
--input_graph=/tmp/retrained.pb
--input_checkpoint=/tmp/checkpoints/mobilenet-10202.ckpt
--input_binary=true
--output_graph=/tmp/frozen_mobilenet_v1_224.pb
--output_node_names=MobileNet/Softmax

1.https://codelabs.developers.google.com/codelabs/tensorflow-for-poets/#3
( generated the new pb file from the above site)=>retranined.pb obtained
2. wanted to convert .tlite format.I have followed the below link:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/README.md
Step 2. Model format conversion
Graph freezing can be done using the command below (and modifying the arguments appropriately)
bazel build tensorflow/python/tools:freeze_graph
bazel-bin/tensorflow/python/tools/freeze_graph
--input_graph=/tmp/retrained.pb 
--input_checkpoint=/tmp/checkpoints/mobilenet-10202.ckpt

--output_graph=/tmp/frozen_mobilenet_v1_224.pb 
--output_node_names=MobileNet/Softmax
body:
Have I written custom code: N/A
OS Platform and Distribution: UBUNTU 16.04LTS
TensorFlow installed from:  https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux
                                           https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux#InstallingVirtualenv
CUDA/cuDNN version : N/A
GPU model and memory: N/A
Exact command to reproduce:
 1.https://codelabs.developers.google.com/codelabs/tensorflow-for-poets/#3
( generated the new pb file from the above site)=>retranined.pb obtained
2. wanted to convert .tlite format.I have followed the below link:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/README.md
Step 2. Model format conversion
Graph freezing can be done using the command below (and modifying the arguments appropriately)

bazel build tensorflow/python/tools:freeze_graph

bazel-bin/tensorflow/python/tools/freeze_graph\
    --input_graph=/tmp/retrained.pb \
    --input_checkpoint=/tmp/checkpoints/mobilenet-10202.ckpt \
    --input_binary=true 
       --output_graph=/tmp/frozen_mobilenet_v1_224.pb \
    --output_node_names=MobileNet/Softmax
